${modID}:Starlight.NAME: Starlight
DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, #yScry #b%d cards.
Draw #b%d card. NL Starlight is unaffected by #yFocus.

${modID}:Horizon.NAME: Horizon
DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain #b%d #yFocus.
Trigger the #yEvoke effects of your other orbs. NL Horizon is unaffected by #yFocus.
